title: Google Store removes dedicated ‘Gaming’ tab, effectively burying Stadia, to highlight Pixel Buds
content:
In the midst of Google I/O today and the plethora of Pixel product announcements, the Google Store has removed its dedicated “Gaming” tab, effectively burying Stadia listings in an effort to highlight the Pixel Buds Pro.

more…

The post Google Store removes dedicated ‘Gaming’ tab, effectively burying Stadia, to highlight Pixel Buds appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Google Store has removed its dedicated "Gaming" tab, effectively burying Stadia products in order to highlight the Pixel Buds Pro.
